CreateEnvironment.document: This example shows you how to create a namespace. You can enable "Auto-Create Subscription" as needed when creating the namespace.
CreateEnvironment.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdmq.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateEnvironment
<Common request parameters>

{
    "EnvironmentId": "test1",
    "MsgTTL": "100",
    "AutoSubscriptionCreation": true,
    "ClusterId": "pulsar-xxxxxxxx"
}
CreateEnvironment.title: Creating a namespace

Host: tdmq.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeRabbitMQUser
<Common request parameters>

    "InstanceId": "amqp-44w9928j",
    "User": "test_user",
    "Password": "abc123"
}
CreateRabbitMQUser.title: Creating a TDMQ for RabbitMQ user

CreateRabbitMQVipInstance.document: This example shows you how to create a TDMQ for RabbitMQ exclusive instance.
CreateRabbitMQVipInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdmq.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateRabbitMQVipInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "ZoneIds": [
        190001
    ],
    "NodeSpec": "rabbit-vip-basic-2",
    "NodeNum": 1,
    "StorageSize": 100,
    "VpcId": "vpc-xxx",
    "SubnetId": "subnet-xxx",
    "ClusterName": "ApiCreate",
    "EnableCreateDefaultHaMirrorQueue": false
}
CreateRabbitMQVipInstance.title: Creating a TDMQ for RabbitMQ exclusive instance

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdmq.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateRocketMQGroup
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Remark": "example",
    "BroadcastEnable": "true",
    "ClusterId": "rocketmq-2p9vx3ax9jxg",
    "RetryMaxTimes": "16",
    "Namespaces": [
        "example"
    ],
    "ReadEnable": "true",
    "GroupType": "TCP",
    "GroupId": "group-example"
}

DescribeTopics.document: This example shows you how to obtain the list of topics under the environment.
DescribeTopics.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdmq.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeTopics
<Common request parameters>

{
    "EnvironmentId": "abc",
    "TopicName": "abc",
    "Offset": 1,
    "Limit": 1,
    "TopicType": 1,
    "ClusterId": "abc",
    "Filters": [
        {
            "Name": "abc",
            "Values": [
                "abc"
            ]
        }
    ],
    "TopicCreator": 1
}
DescribeTopics.title: Obtaining the list of topics under the environment

SendMessages.document:
This example shows you how to send a single message.
The message cannot be sent to a non-persistent topic.
SendMessages.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdmq.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SendMessages
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Topic": "tenant/namespace/topic",
    "Payload": "\"hello TDMQ\""
}
SendMessages.title: Sending a single message

SendRocketMQMessage.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdmq.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SendRocketMQMessage
<Common request parameters>

{
    "NamespaceId": "xx",
    "ClusterId": "xx",
    "TopicName": "xx",
    "MsgKey": "xx",
    "MsgTag": "xx",
    "MsgBody": "xx"
}
SendRocketMQMessage.title: Sending a TDMQ for RocketMQ message
